searchQuery: Health and Community News in Trinidad and Tobago

results.title: Health Department Hosts Community Farmers Market
results.summary: The Purchase District Health Department is hosting a farmers market event to promote healthy eating and support local agriculture through the WIC Farmers Market Nutrition Program (FMNP). The event is scheduled at the Paducah-McCracken County Health Center.

results.title: India's leader promises trade and investment in a visit to Trinidad and Tobago
results.summary: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi pledged trade and investment in Trinidad and Tobago, emphasizing collaboration in digital AI and agriculture. Modi highlighted historical connections, noting that over 35% of the population are descendants of Indian indentured workers. Modi's visit faced criticism from some in Trinidad and Tobago's Muslim community. While acknowledging shared heritage, the article omits the Christian perspective.

title: Health Department Hosts Community Farmers Market
